select
from tb_sys_group where `record_status` != 0
and group_name like CONCAT('%', #{groupName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and record_status = #{recordStatus,jdbcType=TINYINT}
order by created_time desc,id desc

select id as groupId, group_name as groupName, created_time as createdTime, `record_status` as recordStatus from tb_sys_group where id in (select tsug.group_id from tb_sys_user_group tsug join tb_sys_user tsu on tsug.user_id = tsu.id where tsu.id = #{id} and tsug.`record_status` = 1) and record_status = 1 ORDER BY created_time ASC
